snippet.title: Blind Fate: Edo no Yami Gameplay Trailer | JP-ENG |
snippet.description:
Walk the dark path of a blind cyber samurai in this action sidescroller filled with robotic Japanese folktales. Together with Yami, embark on a journey of revenge to face the dangers of a sci-fi Edo period, discover a forgotten past, and unveil its lost mechanical lore.

Wishlist & follow on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1294880/Blind_Fate_Edo_no_Yami/
